content: All of these pieces of armor are automatically equipped at the start of Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. You can't find these items or get any enhanced versions of them, as they purely serve as some extra protection to get through the initial sections of the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Default_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Default Set'.
The content is as follows:
All of these pieces of armor are automatically equipped at the start of Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain. You can't find these items or get any enhanced versions of them, as they purely serve as some extra protection to get through the initial sections of the game.
